WorkItem.ClosedComment: Resolved in the last release version.
WorkItem.Description:
Hi there - excellent utility!  Following a discussion, would it be possible for a flag to be added e.g. PutFirstRowIntoHeader boolean, so that if the first row of an excel sheet are headers, these can be used?  I believe someone in the discussion has even provided code to amend the dataset to do this.
Kind Regards,  Mark
WorkItem.Summary: Request for first row to be used as header flag/property
